info.description: API to create, update and manage beneficiary details related to payment processing
info.title: Management of Payments beneficiaries

post.description: Creates beneficiary with details such as beneficial account, address, beneficiary bank and other preferred options for payment processing

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

get.description: Retrieves existing beneficiary details such as beneficial account, address, beneficiary bank and other preferred options for payment processing

parameters.name: beneficiaryId
parameters.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

put.description: Updates an existing beneficiary with details such as beneficial account, address, beneficiary bank and other preferred options for payment processing

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

delete.description: Deletes existing beneficiary of a customer defined for payment processing

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

beneficiaryNames.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary

beneficiaryName.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary

lastNames.description: The last name of an individual customer

lastName.description: The last name of an individual customer

streets.description: Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.

street.description: Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.

addressCities.description: The town and/or city component of the base address of a customer

addressCity.description: The town and/or city component of the base address of a customer

postCodes.description: Identifies the address postal code for the customer.

postCode.description: Identifies the address postal code for the customer.

ultimateCreditorAddressLines.description: It specifies the address fields to be used for the Ultimate creditor of payment

ultimateCreditorAddressLine.description: It specifies the address fields to be used for the Ultimate creditor of payment

accountWithBankDisplayNames.description: Indicates the name of financial institution with which beneficiary holds an account

accountWithBankDisplayName.description: Indicates the name of financial institution with which beneficiary holds an account

accountWithBankStreets.description: Indicates the street address of financial institution with which beneficiary holds an account

accountWithBankStreet.description: Indicates the street address of financial institution with which beneficiary holds an account

accountWithBankCities.description: Indicates the town or city of financial institution with which beneficiary holds an account

accountWithBankCity.description: Indicates the town or city of financial institution with which beneficiary holds an account

accountWithBankPostCodes.description: Indicates the post code of financial institution with which beneficiary holds an account

accountWithBankPostCode.description: Indicates the post code of financial institution with which beneficiary holds an account

accountWithBankCountryIds.description: The country of the beneficiary institution i.e. where the final creditor holds an account

accountWithBankCountryId.description: The country of the beneficiary institution i.e. where the final creditor holds an account

paymentDetails.description: Indicates the payment details for the beneficiary to apply the payment.

paymentDetail.description: Indicates the payment details for the beneficiary to apply the payment.

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

customerReference.description: The reference which is provided to the beneficiary/ creditor by the originator of payment

categoryId.description: Unique identifier associated with the product name of the account or contract. For example: For customer/counterparty accounts, the identifier would be in the range 1000 to 9999. For ledger accounts, in the range 10000 to 19999.

hintText.description: This is a free text field which can be provided for Bank defined beneficiaries

defaultNarrative.description: The default narrative which will be provided on the debit and credit side of the payment.

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: Identifies the Customer who is to be the ultimate receiver of the funds transferred by the sending bank when this Beneficiary is not a bank.

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

beneficiarySchemeName.description: Indicates the account type of the beneficiary account like CLABE , MOBILE , ACCOUNT NO. etc.

paymentCountry.description: The country to which a payment is sent, usually where the beneficiary resides

beneficiaryOtherId.description: Indicates the beneficiary other identifier, e.g. could be a Social Security Number, a Tax Identification Number, Passport Number, a Clearing Id etc.

beneficiaryOtherIdType.description: Indicates the type of the beneficiary i.e. Organisation or Private

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

beneficiaryBirthProvince.description: Indicates the beneficiary place of birth

beneficiaryBirthCity.description: Indicates the beneficiary city of birth

beneficiaryBirthCountry.description: Indicates the beneficiary country of birthh

beneficiarySchemeCode.description: Indicates the name of the identification scheme, in a coded form as published in an external list.

beneficiarySchemeProprietary.description: The proprietary code of the scheme which issued the identifier for the Beneficiary

beneficiarySchemeIssuer.description: Indicates the issuer of other id of the beneficiary

ultimateCreditorOtherIdType.description: This is to indicate if the Ultimate Creditor is an Organisation or a Private individual

ultimateCreditorOtherId.description: This is the other identifier of ultimate creditor, e.g. could be a Social Security Number, a Tax Identification Number, Passport Number, a Clearing Id etc.

ultimateCreditor.description: Contains the actual creditor account number

ultimateCreditorAddressType.description: It specifies the address type to be used for the Ultimate creditor of payment i.e. Postal, Business, Residential etc.

ultimateCreditorBIC.description: It specifies the BIC code of Ultimate creditor of payment

ultimateCreditorCountry.description: It specifies the Country of Ultimate creditor of payment

ultimateCreditorDOB.description: It indicates the Date Of Birth of ultimate creditor

ultimateCreditorBirthProvince.description: It indicates the place of birth for ultimate creditor

ultimateCreditorBirthCity.description: It indicates the birth city of ultimate creditor

ultimateCreditorBirthCountry.description: It indicates the country of birth for the ultimate creditor

ultimateCreditorSchemeProprietary.description: The proprietary code of the scheme which issued the identifier for the ultimate creditor

ultimateCreditorSchemeIssuer.description: Indicates the issuer of other id of the ultimate creditor

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account

accountWithBankSortCode.description: Bank sort code details with account

accountWithBankIBAN.description: This is the IBAN of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

beneficiaryBankClearingCode.description: Clearing code or sort code of the beneficiary bank

preferredPaymentProduct.description: Preferred payment product can be specified for Beneficiary. This will be used for defaulting the payment product for specific beneficiary.

paymentCategory.description: The purpose code for the payment. Should be one of the pre-defined purpose codes in the application and information will be used for payment processing

paymentOrderPurposeCodeId.description: Indicates the Id of payment purpose code i.e. purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.

paymentCurrency.description: This field holds the transaction currency or currency in which payment is initiated.

preferredPaymentAmount.description: Preferred payment amount can be specified for the beneficiary. If specified, it will be populated during payment processing.

beneficiaryOurCharges.description: Indicates the bearer of the charges. For example: BEN( All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR (All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA (Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

benRiskRate.description: List of Beneficiary risk rate that the protection limit applies to

linkBeneficiaryId.description: The identifier of a beneficiary (defined by the institution) being linked to a customer-defined beneficiary

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
